description: Have you heard of the fascinating city in Brazil called Rio de Janeiro? Join Julia as she visits her family in Rio and watches many Olympic events. A Trip to Rio provides students an adventurous tour of this spectacular city, including detailed descriptions and colorful illustrations. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters and the proper use of exclamatory sentences. The book and lesson are also available for levels J and M.
